Articles.Content:
I recently moved to KSP Realism overhaul rather than frustration from orbital difficulty I struggle to keep the program running after about 10-15 mins the game hits around 3.8gb and crashes I often dont get a flight I sometimes get as far as editing a craft hitting either build or exit to space center and crash. I have open GL active and active texture management and running at half texture resolution.

 

I am running; Windows 7 64bit 

xeon e1230v2 (strange I know I had an I5 3570k but my Mrs now has that and I had the xeon spare)

GTX 660 2gb GDDR5

16gb ripjaw RAM

 

PLEASE HELP!!!!

 

Thanks

 

Edited March 3, 2016 by Dwsg01
Please follow the steps in the sticky at the top of this forum.

1 hour ago, Dwsg01 said:

I recently moved to KSP Realism overhaul rather than frustration from orbital difficulty I struggle to keep the program running after about 10-15 mins the game hits around 3.8gb and crashes I often dont get a flight I sometimes get as far as editing a craft hitting either build or exit to space center and crash. I have open GL active and active texture management and running at half texture resolution.

 

I am running; Windows 7 64bit 

xeon e1230v2 (strange I know I had an I5 3570k but my Mrs now has that and I had the xeon spare)

GTX 660 2gb GDDR5

16gb ripjaw RAM

 

PLEASE HELP!!!!

 

Thanks

 

Wait till 1.1 or hack it to get 64 bit.

One I think that this may be purely because of the fact that you have over 44 mods including realism overhaul two you should follow what Nathankell said and look at the sticky on the top of this forum page another thing I would like to comment on is your grammar use you do not use punctuation marks you do not even use apostrophes your OP is a huge run-on sentence how are you even satisfied while writing this thread topic I don't even know I never do that.

Seriously, you're not Leo Tolstoy. Only he can do that well.

31 minutes ago, NathanKell said:

Please follow the steps in the sticky at the top of this forum.

I've done what is stable already I even put that I have used open gl forcing dx11 causes graphics glitches and 64 bit hacks are unstable the building show as fully upgraded so no good
Here is the link. Do please try reading all of it, and doing all of what it asks. I can't help you without the things it asks for.

32 minutes ago, davidy12 said:

Wait till 1.1 or hack it to get 64 bit.

I hate to admit it but I figured this would be the case 64bit hack is so useless haha, thanks for the input

Seriously, you're not Leo Tolstoy. Only he can do that well.

I am running the mods recommended widely for realism overhaul, are there any you wouldn't bother with?

50 minutes ago, NathanKell said:

Please follow the steps in the sticky at the top of this forum.

My apologise I did not see this sticky I'm on my mobile and it's half way down the page, a post about ram relief is at the top. I will jump on my computer and create a full report asap
Thanks!

38 minutes ago, NathanKell said:

Here is the link. Do please try reading all of it, and doing all of what it asks. I can't help you without the things it asks for.

 

KSP: 1.0.5 Windows 7 64bit

Problem: Crashing after 10-15 mins when ram limitis reached no particular mod

Mods installed:

All recommended for realism overall

Reproduction steps:

Run KSP for 10-15 mins on switch from one instance to another like VAB to the space centre game crashes/closes

Log: http://we.tl/3duQ8Tlra7

 

 

Edited March 3, 2016 by Dwsg01

You ran out memory for the KSP process. However, I can't tell exactly what you mean by "all recommended mods" -- some people think that includes the 'suggested' mods as well, so I really do ask you to follow the instructions and provide your complete mod list. Further, unless you tell me, I don't know what size texture pack you installed for RSS, or any of the other options.

Once you actually tell me what mods you have installed, I can help you figure out where to save on RAM.

1 hour ago, Dwsg01 said:

I am running the mods recommended widely for realism overhaul, are there any you wouldn't bother with?

It is widely not recommended to install every single mod from the RO repository.

Do you have a certain mod called Realistic Visual Enhancements? That may be causing most of your problems.

You ran out memory for the KSP process. However, I can't tell exactly what you mean by "all recommended mods" -- some people think that includes the 'suggested' mods as well, so I really do ask you to follow the instructions and provide your complete mod list. Further, unless you tell me, I don't know what size texture pack you installed for RSS, or any of the other options.

Once you actually tell me what mods you have installed, I can help you figure out where to save on RAM.

The more Iook at my list the more I realise CKAN has automatically installed all sorts I just don't know what I can and can't clear.

1 hour ago, Matuchkin said:

It is widely not recommended to install every single mod from the RO repository.

Do you have a certain mod called Realistic Visual Enhancements? That may be causing most of your problems.

Thats one out of many I don't have I think Iv'e let CKAN do too much

Edited March 3, 2016 by Dwsg01
@Dwsg01 That's about a bazillion more than just what RO recommends. Please don't install the merely suggested mods

Just now, NathanKell said:

@Dwsg01 That's about a bazillion more than just what RO recommends. Please don't install the merely suggested mods

Im just creating a new instance of the install now and I'm looking through each mod in CKAN now, I think my head may explode.
@Dwsg01 when you install RO and RP-0, CKAN will autoselect the mods you should install with it. Do not select the extras it suggests if they are not already checked.

The more Iook at my list the more I realise CKAN has automatically installed all sorts I just don't know what I can and can't clear.

I'm upset how obvious that actually is :|, I'm going to dismantle my computer now
